thread.title: Ark. high school football coach arrested after game for 'inciting riot'
thread.title_full: Ark. high school football coach arrested after game for 'inciting riot'

title: Ark. high school football coach arrested after game for 'inciting riot'
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Ark. high school football coach arrested after game for 'inciting riot' ELKINS, Ark. (KTHV) – The Cedarville High School football coach was arrested on Wednesday after their game against Elkins after allegedly attempted to start a riot. Post to Facebook Ark. high school football coach arrested after game for 'inciting riot' ELKINS, Ark. (KTHV) – The Cedarville High School football coach was arrested on Wednesday after their game against Elkins after allegedly attempted to start a riot.  //on.kthv.com/1LMFonH   Join the Conversation To   Ark. high school football coach arrested after game for 'inciting riot' 5:36 p.m. CDT October 21, 2015 Kevin Lea, 36. CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ELKINS, Ark. (KTHV) – The Cedarville High School football coach was arrested on Wednesday after their game against Elkins after allegedly attempted to start a riot. 
Kevin Lea, 36, faces charges of inciting riot, failure to disperse, harassment, obstructing governmental operations and endangering the welfare of a minor as the result of his actions during the game. 
According to a story from THV11 affiliate in Fort Smith, KFSM, Lea was taken to the Washington County Detention Center and bonded out later on Wednesday. Read or Share this story: http://on.kthv.com/1LMFonH TOP VIDEOS
